purpose: The email announces a full-time Post-Doc position at the Johannes Kepler University Linz Institute of Technology, focusing on software engineering research in collaboration with Dynatrace. The position involves conducting research in distributed software systems, cloud computing, and real-time data processing, along with responsibilities such as applying for grants and publishing findings. Interested candidates are encouraged to apply by the deadline of August 10.
